message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you 40 and keep 60. You can do better than this?
I'll take a bit more, but still a fair split. Your turn to think!
That's a bit too generous for you, I think I'll try to get a better deal.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Take it or leave it!
I'll take a significant share, but I'm willing to give you a small amount. Don't expect more!
Fine, I'll take the 20, but I'm not happy about it.
